name: Shufflepuck (itch)
description:
Play air hockey against unique computer characters or your friends!

Controls:

Use the mouse or the following keys to move your paddle:

Player 1:
Left: Left arrow
Right: Right arrow
Forwards: Up arrow
Backwards: Down arrow

Player 2:
Left: a
Right: d
Forwards: w
Backwards: s

Toggle full screen mode: Escape or Command-f
Quit: Command-q
